name: Bonifasius Ariesto Adrian Finantyo
summary: Hello! My name is Bonifasius Ariesto Adrian Finantyo, student of Universitas Multimedia Nusantara, Indonesia. An enthusiastic software engineer learns a new skill every day. Student, freelance web developer, and React JS enthusiast. Currently working on several web development projects. Active on organization and likes a challenge. Interested and still learning about web app development.
